data.title: Forest Ranger Rosters
data.meta_description: List of Forest Ranger managers and staff at Albany and regional offices.
data.text:
Forest Ranger Emergency Contact:

1-833-NYS-RANGERS (1-833-697-7264)

Forest Rangers organize and conduct wildland search and rescue missions, prevent and suppress forest fires and act as stewards of public lands.

Central Office

Robert Cavanagh, Acting Director

625 Broadway, 3rd Floor

Albany, NY 12233-2560

Phone: (518) 402-8839, Fax: (518) 402-8840
